Description:
Location-Dubai ,  ,United Arab Emirates (AE) Job ID -5784Job Responsibilities Execute import and export shipment end to end.
Ability to handle both LCL and FCL shipments and hazardous.
Arranging for DO and B/L collection.
Handle multiple shipments end to end at the same time.
Well-motivated and capable to handle freight forwarding operations independently without supervision.
Timely and accurate scheduling of hazardous and non-hazardous bookings.
Arranging Customs clearance and documentation.
Submit shipping instructions.
Monitor suppliers’ invoices and performance.
Complete job costing and billing.
Follow company SOPs and achieve KPIsJob RequirementsBachelor’s degree in business or any other field
3-4 years of relevant working experience in the Freight Forwarding and Logistics industry
Experience in operations and broad knowledge of regulations.
Excellent MS office skills: Word, Excel and Power Point
Good commands in professional emails writing
Well organized, able to handle stress, with experience in costing and operations. 
Knowledge of local and international requirements and regulations.
Ability to handle multiple shipments at the same time.
Follow the end to end shipment cycle and support in maintaining business.
update shipment status.
IMDG experience and Cargo Wise are plus.Company Overview:Since our founding in 1982 we have grown to become a world leader in comprehensive transport and delivery solutions for business and consumers. Headquartered in Dubai, at the heart of the world’s most dynamic commercial hub and on the site of historic trade routes linking east and west, commerce and transport are deeply embedded in Aramex’s DNA. We are dedicated to transforming the face of trade, expanding our operations rapidly to better connect businesses and consumers worldwide.Job Details
